text:
Hi,
It appears that there may be an issue with the Revenue Operation course regarding the first questions on *"How to Map a Sales Process and Systems Management for RevOps."* Despite attempting all the options, none of them are marked as correct. Could someone from the HubSpot team please provide guidance or resolve this issue?
I think someone needs to take an academy course on UX… what am i supposed to do with this page
I’m personally kind of impressed that the page supports this wide of an aspect ratio.
Hey thank you for bringing this up, I will bring it up to the team
